channel.title: Apps on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Now Jack Dorsey has built an app to track your vitamin D
item.description: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey has released a new app that tracks your sun exposure and vitamin D levels. It’s his second app in a week, after last weekend’s encrypted peer-to-peer messaging app Bitch
